text.title: Nico Rosberg takes pole for 2015 Brazilian Grand Prix
text.head: Nico Rosberg takes pole for 2015 Brazilian Grand Prix
Sources

list.item: Pablo Elizalde. "Brazilian GP: Rosberg beats Hamilton to grab fifth straight pole" — motorsport.com , November 14, 2015
Ben Anderson. "Brazilian GP: Nico Rosberg extends F1 pole streak at Interlagos" — Autosport , November 14, 2015
